secText:
Essential Question:
How can we describe two-dimensional motion?

Enduring Understandings:
1. [OBJ:expsec_d454:Displacement occurs in two dimensions] and can be described using [OBJ:expsec_b762:vectors] and [OBJ:expsec_d455:rectangular notation].
2. [OBJ:expsec_d466:Velocity also occurs in two dimensions] and can be described using vectors and rectangular notation.

STEM Skills:
1. Review [OBJ:expsec_b763:displacement] in one dimension.
2. Review [OBJ:expsec_b764:velocity] in one dimension.
